item.title: [SBG5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:

item.title: [Global][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 delivery disabled
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 9, 2023, 07:00 - 17:00 UTC

Dec 21, 22:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/01/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/01/2023 18:00 UTC 
Service impact : Delivery and reset of Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 disabled
Ongoing actions : Following our end-of-support policy, the Managed Kubernetes Service team will mark as deprecated the Kubernetes version 1.22. It will no longer be possible to create Managed Kubernetes clusters under the 1.22 version, or to reset existing clusters into this version. For more details, please refer to these documentations:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/eos-eol-policies/
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/kubernetes-plugins-software-versions-reserved-resources/

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries' partial unreachability
item.description:
Dec 28, 14:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/12/2022 12:26 UTC
End Time : 28/12/2022 13:30 UTC
Root cause : The incident is due to a problem with PKI of the Postgres instances used by the Managed Private Registry.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 28, 13:07 UTC
Update - Investigation reported that the docker registry is down.
For impacted private registries, the docker registry is unavailable and will give certificate errors. The web interface is operational, but unable to login.

Dec 28, 12:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/12/2022 12:26 UTC 
Service impact : Some registries are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
The web interface is operational, but you may be unable to login.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
